name: MIS UNSUPPORTED Prisoner Earnings (NSR1038)
description: PDI0026 - This report outputs all transactions for a specified prisoner between two dates. Activities attendance is also included

dataset.name: Earnings
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT * AS BUSINESS_DATE_ FROM (SELECT AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME ELSE TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME) - 1 / 86400 END, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_NAME, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE, COALESCE(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.MODIFY_USER_ID, COALESCE(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.CREATE_USER_ID, 'Not Recorded')), AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SUM(CASE WHEN AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE IN ('A_EARN', 'EARN', 'UPAY', 'RUPAY', 'EARS') AND AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'CR' THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE IN ('A_EARN', 'EARN', 'UPAY', 'RUPAY', 'EARS') AND AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'DR' THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_BUSINESS_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING WHERE (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK = AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS') AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-07-2020 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('08-07-2020 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = 'A4068DC') GROUP BY AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME ELSE TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME) - 1 / 86400 END, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_NAME, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE, COALESCE(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.MODIFY_USER_ID, COALESCE(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.CREATE_USER_ID, 'Not Recorded')), AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) _query0 FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME ELSE TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME) - 1 / 86400 END, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_NAME, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE, COALESCE(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.MODIFY_USER_ID, COALESCE(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.CREATE_USER_ID, 'Not Recorded')), AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SUM(CASE WHEN AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'CR' THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT WHEN AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'DR' THEN -AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT END) FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_BUSINESS_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING WHERE (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK = AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS') AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-07-2020 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('08-07-2020 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = 'A4068DC') GROUP BY AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME ELSE TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME) - 1 / 86400 END, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_NAME, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE, COALESCE(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.MODIFY_USER_ID, COALESCE(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.CREATE_USER_ID, 'Not Recorded')), AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) _query1 ON _query0.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = _query1.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE_ FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Attendance
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME, AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.CODE, AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.STATUS, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.COMMENT_TEXT FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY, BODIMIS.DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK) AND (TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME) BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-07-2020 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('08-07-2020 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = 'A4068DC')), dataset_ AS (SELECT START_TIME, CODE, DESCRIPTION, STATUS, COMMENT_TEXT FROM dataset_base_)

errors.error: Report field DESCRIPTION does not have corresponding dataset schema field
Report field STATUS does not have corresponding dataset schema field
Report field COMMENT_TEXT does not have corresponding dataset schema field
Error: Error: Query failed: GENERIC_USER_ERROR: Failed To Get Query Passthrough Schema
